name: Naval Strike Operation 2
description:
Title:
Naval strike operation 2

Long description:
Naval strike operation is based on a naval force with gunship combat shooters and other battle war ship requirements.
Naval strike operation game of 2017 is the best ever game graphic, environment, feature and quality wise. You have to challenge yourself by experiencing it and achieve all of its missions.
Super exciting level based designed game to challenge your combat quality. Clash with the battleship wars, aircraft helicopter and naval boats to complete the operations. You as a Naval Strike combat commander, got an order from the high command to move for the air craft carrier war from the Island base to evacuate the carrier from the enemy forces. You have to fly on gunship helicopter. The enemy commandos have entered on the aircraft. Your air craft carrier is loaded with several air jets, helicopters, missile and other military assets. If the enemy get control of carrier, it's a big loss to your force. Snipe, shoot and kill them, the operation should be successful to win the combat. Let’s shoot to save your forces and military assets of naval forces. The enemies are brave enough too as they have all such weapons so be careful.

You have to command, you have to be attentive, look deep in to the situation and shoot the enemies using guns you have got. You are on helicopter. You have to attack from the Helicopter to bring them down to sea and then drop your frontline commandos on the aircraft. Survive yourself and survive the aircraft carrier.

How to use:
• Tap to play the naval strike mission 2017
• Touch & Drag the screen anywhere to move your gun right or left or up and down
• tap Fire button to shoot
• Try to shoot and kill enemy soldiers on first spot
• The guns will reload itself and you have unlimited number of bullets
• You can select either pistol (shotgun) or an assault rifle to see your convenience
• The helicopter is moving slowly toward the enemies Evacuate killing one by one.
• The gun ship helicopter is moving slowly toward the enemies

Features:
• FPS game
• Artificial intelligence
• Frontline commando combat naval strike environment with 3D effects
• Multiple weapons pistol, gun, heavy gun and RPG
• GUI and UI are easy to understand
• Real feel in explosions
• Amazing sound quality
• Level and mission based game play depicting navy combat commando strike mission 2017

What’s new?
• More challenging environments and levels
• Addition of helicopter mode
• Bug fixes
• Improved graphics
